TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed InstanceLockedExceptionAction extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Contains options that specify what action the SQL persistence provider should take when it receives an exception when trying to lock an instance.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Activities.DurableInstancing.InstanceLockedExceptionAction AggressiveRetry = int32(2)

Docs.summary: Specifies that the persistence provider reattempts to lock an instance with an exponentially increasing delay between successive attempts. The persistence provider passes the to the caller at the end of the sequence (after retrying predefined number of times).

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Activities.DurableInstancing.InstanceLockedExceptionAction BasicRetry = int32(1)

Docs.summary: Specifies that the persistence provider reattempts to lock the instance with a linear retry interval. The persistence provider passes the to the caller at the end of the sequence (after retrying predefined number of times).

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Activities.DurableInstancing.InstanceLockedExceptionAction NoRetry = int32(0)

Docs.summary: Specifies that the persistence provider does not reattempt to lock an instance if the instance is already locked by another host.
